title: Remocapp plugin- AI marker-less motion capture studio
description: Real-time AI Marker-less Motion Capture Studio
longDescription:
The world's most affordable Motion Capture solution, which is

✅ REAL-TIME

✅MARKER-LESS

✅SUIT-LESS

✅PORTABLE

✅AFFORDABLE

✅EASY-TO-USE

✅FULL-BODY

✅UNLIMITED-CAPTURE-TIME

✅SIMPLE-WEBCAM-SUPPORT

✅RUNNING-LOCALLY

✅FREE-TO-TEST, and more!


Also,

✅ No need to have green backgrounds

✅ No need to have expensive computers and devices

✅ No need to put on gloves or any special wearing

✅ No need to have special cameras, as it works with any webcam

✅ No need to equip the studio with any special staging etc.

✅ No need to spend a lot of time to prepare the scene

✅ etc.



✴ It has a FREE lifetime license

✴ One-month FREE Pro license



▶️ Demo Video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RkNXb5ELDow


💡 Documentation:

https://docs.remocapp.com


🚀 To get a free license register here:

https://remocapp.com


To download plugins for older Unreal Engine versions please visit https://docs.remocapp.com/article. The sample projects including support for MetaHuman is also available there.


This plugin is a tool to get the captured motion data from Remocapp software. Remocapp software is a marker-less AI-based application that captures human motions and sends real-time animation data to Unreal Engine, without the need to wear gloves and suits. It lets you set up your free MoCap studio.


Disclaimer:

This plugin is designed to work in conjunction with Remocapp, an external software application.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Connects to the Remocapp Windows application to receive captured motions
  • Simplified and user-friendly animation recorder
  • Automatically exports recorded animations to FBX file

Code Modules:

  •  RemocappEditor (Editor)

Number of Blueprints: 12

Number of C++ Classes: 2

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Win64

Supported Target Build Platforms: Win64
